body_html: If you are building from source PyTorch master, you can build and install a combined PyTorch/Caffe2 using FULL_CAFFE2=1 python setup.py install. (Be sure to fully uninstall old versions of PyTorch and Caffe2 first).
body_text: If you are building from source PyTorch master, you can build and install a combined PyTorch/Caffe2 using FULL_CAFFE2=1 python setup.py install. (Be sure to fully uninstall old versions of PyTorch and Caffe2 first).
body: If you are building from source PyTorch master, you can build and install a combined PyTorch/Caffe2 using `FULL_CAFFE2=1 python setup.py install`. (Be sure to fully uninstall old versions of PyTorch and Caffe2 first).
